mapper.select: SELECT wm.work_member_name workMemberName , wm.work_member_email workMemberEmail FROM task_member tm INNER JOIN project_member pm ON tm.project_member_no = pm.project_member_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON pm.work_member_no = wm.work_member_no WHERE tm.task_no = #{taskNo}

SELECT tm.task_no taskNo , pm.work_member_no workMemberNo , v.work_member_name workMemberName FROM task_member tm LEFT OUTER JOIN project_member pm ON tm.project_member_no = pm.project_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN v_workspace_member v ON pm.work_member_no = v.work_member_no WHERE pm.project_no = #{projectNo}

SELECT p.project_member_no projectMemberNo , p.project_no projectNo , t.task_no taskNo , w.work_member_name workMemberName FROM project_member p LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT task_no, project_member_no FROM task_member WHERE task_no = #{taskNo} ) t ON p.project_member_no = t.project_member_no INNER JOIN workspace_member w ON p.work_member_no = w.work_member_no WHERE p.project_no = #{projectNo} AND p.active = 'Y'

SELECT tm.task_no taskNo , tm.project_member_no projectMemberNo FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON tl.tasklist_no = t.tasklist_no INNER JOIN task_member tm ON t.task_no = tm.task_no WHERE tl.tasklist_no = #{tasklistNo}

SELECT tm.task_no taskNo , tm.project_member_no projectMemberNo , pm.work_member_no workMemberNo FROM task t INNER JOIN task_member tm ON t.task_no = tm.task_no INNER JOIN project_member pm ON tm.project_member_no = pm.project_member_no WHERE t.task_no = #{taskNo}
